SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwHRAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Hireling			    0 RedoranReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30
; 1 = Retainer			    5 RedoranReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Oathman			  10 RedoranReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Lawman			  20 RedoranReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Kinsman			  30 RedoranReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = House Cousin	  45 RedoranReputation,	Strength 31, Endurance 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = House Brother	  60 RedoranReputation,	Strength 32, Endurance 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = House Father		  80 RedoranReputation,	Strength 33, Endurance 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Councilman		100 RedoranReputation,	Strength 34, Endurance 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Archmaster		125 RedoranReputation,	Strength 35, Endurance 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Redoran = Armorer, Athletics, Blade, Blunt, Heavy Armor, Light Armor

SHORT RedoranAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT RedoranReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelledOnce

float fQuestDelayTime

BEGIN GameMode

	if (fQuestDelayTime != 0.5)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	endif
		
	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Redoran == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Redoran
		If GetPCFactionSteal 0Redoran
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0Redoran)
				SetPCExpelled 0Redoran 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from House Redoran."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0Redoran 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0Redoran
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0Redoran)
				SetPCExpelled 0Redoran 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from House Redoran."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0Redoran 0
			endif
		EndIf
	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF RedoranAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 40	 ; Qualified to start building Stronghold
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 41
			SetStage fbmwHRStronghold 5
			AddTopic 1stronghold
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 91
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET RedoranAdvancement TO 0
; Continue processing to see if player can advance multiple ranks
;		RETURN
	ENDIF ; RedoranAdvancement == 4

	IF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement >= 41 && GetStage fbmwHRStronghold < 1
		SetStage fbmwHRStronghold 1
		AddTopic 1stronghold
	ENDIF

	IF RedoranAdvancement == 3 || RedoranAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 0
		IF RedoranReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 10 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 10 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 10 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 10
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 1
		IF RedoranReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 20 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 20 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 20 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 20
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 2
		IF RedoranReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 30 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 30 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 30 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 30
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 3
		IF RedoranReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 40 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 40 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 40 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 40
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 4
		IF RedoranReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 31 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 50 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 50 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 50 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 50
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 5
		IF RedoranReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 32 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 60 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 60 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 60 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 60
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 6
		IF RedoranReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 33 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 70 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 70 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 70 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			IF GetStage fbmwHRStronghold < 100 || GetStage fbmwHRMorvaynManor < 100 || GetStage fbmwHROldFlame < 100
				IF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement != 69 ; Don't do this more than Once!
					SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 69
				ENDIF
			ELSE
				SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 70
				SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			ENDIF

			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 7
		IF RedoranReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 34 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 80 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 80 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 80 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			IF GetStage fbmwHRStronghold < 200 || GetStage fbmwHRArobarKidnap < 100 || GetStage fbmwHRCalderaDisrupt < 100
				IF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement != 79 ; Don't do this more than Once!
					SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 79
				ENDIF
			ELSE
				SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 80
				SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			ENDIF

			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHRAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Redoran == 8
		IF RedoranReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 35 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 90 || Player.GetAV Athletics >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 90 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 90 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHRAdvancement 90
			SET RedoranAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET RedoranAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET RedoranAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET RedoranAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 3489 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
